budget.description: Performance budget for bookin CRO pages

notes.LCP: Target <2.5s. Cal.com iframe is main content, so preconnect is critical.
notes.CLS: Target <0.1. Height reservation on iframe prevents layout shifts.
notes.TBT: Target <200ms. Intersection Observer instead of scroll events reduces blocking.
notes.Bundle: CRO components add ~12KB (4.7KB gzipped). Acceptable for conversion uplift.
notes.ThirdParty: Cal.com embed adds ~300KB. No control, but preconnect helps.
